author: Scott Manley
description:
Last year I made a video on Lumen orbit's proposal to build data centers in space, now all the big players in spaceflight and AI are seriously looking at this. And while there's economic arguments that may be realized at some point in the future, there are other forces that may drive this.

Andrew McCalip's helpful tool for playing with numbers
https://andrewmccalip.com/space-datacenters

Google's Suncatcher paper
https://services.google.com/fh/files/misc/suncatcher_paper.pdf

The original Lumen (now Starcloud) paper.
https://starcloudinc.github.io/wp.pdf

Follow me on Twitter for more updates:
https://twitter.com/DJSnM

I have a discord server where I regularly turn up:
https://discord.gg/zStmKbM

If you really like what I do you can support me directly through Patreon
https://www.patreon.com/scottmanley
title: Why Everyone Is Talking About Data Centers In Space
